div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

For now, i really don't know. I focus on my studies first and then, we will see. But in 10 years, I would like to have a beautiful house in a quite place. with my wife and my children. I would like too became a criminologe or a sociologe. Be paid well, i don't like money problems. I want not became a rich man, but just for live well. I think that sit for the moment, but I am only eighteen years old.
